## Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
```


##Load data
```{r}
homicide <- read.csv("homicide-data.csv")
```


##Chicago homicides
```{r}
chic_homicide <- homicide %>%
  filter(city == "Chicago")
```


##Create a map showing homicides using sf function
```{r}
chic_homs <- st_as_sf(chic_homicide, coords = c("lon", "lat")) %>%
  st_set_crs(4269)

chic_map <- counties(state = "IL", cb = TRUE, class = "sf")
chic_map <- chic_map %>%
  filter(COUNTYFP == "031")
```
